name: Space Fox Kimi and the Interstellar Castle
name_original: Space Fox Kimi and the Interstellar Castle
description:
This is a short silly side story to the Space Fox Kimi main series (https://shentzu.itch.io/space-fox-kimi) made for the very first Extra Credits Game Design Jam over two days. It's (mostly) non-canon and shouldn't be taken seriously. If you like it please check out the main series. Thank you!

----CONTROLS----

Arrow keys to move/select
Z to interact/confirm
X for menu/go back
Hold SHIFT to run 

----ADDITIONAL CREDITS----

Yanfly for various Yanfly Engine Plugins
DreamX for status description scripts
SkottyTV for Window Skin
Patrick de Arteaga for Music
TheFinnicle for Portrait Art
MillionthVector for Ship Sprites
